``` ## Scorpio Season Incoming!! The first 6 reading assignments and quizzes are open for retakes until October 31! ::: fragment **This is your last chance!!** ::: ::: fragment **No more new chances will be coming for remaining of semester.** ::: ::: fragment **Other Assignment are still due.** ::: ## Plotathon ![](img/PAT24%20L&L%20Tools%20Workshop.png){fig-align="center"} # Empty Model ## Motivation: Penguins ::: columns ::: {.column width="50%"} ::: {.cell} ::: {.cell-output .cell-output-stdout} ``` #> # A tibble: 8 × 1 #> bill_length_mm #> #> 1 39.6 #> 2 40.3 #> 3 44 #> 4 49.3 #> 5 49.1 #> 6 50.7 #> 7 40.6 #> 8 42.1 ``` ::: ::: ::: ::: {.column width="50%"} $$ \hat Y = 44.5 $$ ::: ::: ## Quantifying Error ::: columns ::: {.column width="50%"} ::: {.cell} ::: {.cell-output .cell-output-stdout} ``` #> # A tibble: 8 × 1 #> bill_length_mm #> #> 1 39.6 #> 2 40.3 #> 3 44 #> 4 49.3 #> 5 49.1 #> 6 50.7 #> 7 40.6 #> 8 42.1 ``` ::: ::: ::: ::: {.column width="50%"} $$ \hat Y = 44.5 $$ $$ \sum^8_{i=1}(Y_i-\hat Y_i)^2 $$ ::: ::: ## SSE ::: {.cell} ::: {.cell-output .cell-output-stdout} ``` #> # A tibble: 1 × 1 #> sse #> #> 1 145. ``` ::: ::: # Linear Model ## Linear Model $$ Y = b_0 + b_1 X + \varepsilon $$ ## Calculate Means per Species ::: {.cell} ::: {.cell-output .cell-output-stdout} ``` #> # A tibble: 8 × 2 #> species bill_length_mm #> #> 1 Adelie 39.6 #> 2 Adelie 40.3 #> 3 Gentoo 44 #> 4 Gentoo 49.3 #> 5 Gentoo 49.1 #> 6 Gentoo 50.7 #> 7 Adelie 40.6 #> 8 Adelie 42.1 ``` ::: ::: ::: fragement ::: {.cell} ::: {.cell-output .cell-output-stdout} ``` #> # A tibble: 2 × 2 #> species mean #> #> 1 Adelie 40.6 #> 2 Gentoo 48.3 ``` ::: ::: ::: ## Construct Model ::: {.cell} ::: {.cell-output .cell-output-stdout} ``` #> # A tibble: 2 × 2 #> species mean #> #> 1 Adelie 40.6 #> 2 Gentoo 48.3 ``` ::: ::: $$ \hat Y = 40.65 + 7.625 X $$ $$ X = \left\{\begin{array}{cc} 1 & Adelie\\ 0 & Gentoo \end{array} \right. $$ ## Compute SSE ::: columns ::: {.column width="50%"} ::: {.cell} ::: {.cell-output .cell-output-stdout} ``` #> # A tibble: 8 × 2 #> species bill_length_mm #> #> 1 Adelie 39.6 #> 2 Adelie 40.3 #> 3 Gentoo 44 #> 4 Gentoo 49.3 #> 5 Gentoo 49.1 #> 6 Gentoo 50.7 #> 7 Adelie 40.6 #> 8 Adelie 42.1 ``` ::: ::: ::: ::: {.column width="50%"} $$ \hat Y = 40.65 + 7.625 X $$ $$ X = \left\{\begin{array}{cc} 1 & Adelie\\ 0 & Gentoo \end{array} \right. $$ $$ SSE = \sum^8_{i=1}(Y_i-\hat Y_i)^2 $$ ::: ::: ## SSE ::: {.cell} ::: {.cell-output .cell-output-stdout} ``` #> [1] 29.2175 ``` ::: ::: ## How much was the error reduced by incorporating X? ::: columns ::: {.column width="50%"} ### Empty Model SSE = 145.498 ::: ::: {.column width="50%"} ### Linear Model SSE = 29.2175 ::: ::: ## Percent of the Error Reduction ::: columns ::: {.column width="50%"} ### Empty Model SSE = 145.498 ::: ::: {.column width="50%"} ### Linear Model SSE = 29.2175 ::: ::: ## Percent of variation explained compared to the empty model ::: columns ::: {.column width="50%"} ### Empty Model SSE = 145.498 ::: ::: {.column width="50%"} ### Linear Model SSE = 29.2175 ::: ::: # EPE Session ## Motivation

include-after-body:
<script>
  // htmlwidgets need to know to resize themselves when slides are shown/hidden.
  // Fire the "slideenter" event (handled by htmlwidgets.js) when the current
  // slide changes (different for each slide format).
  (function () {
    // dispatch for htmlwidgets
    function fireSlideEnter() {
      const event = window.document.createEvent("Event");
      event.initEvent("slideenter", true, true);
      window.document.dispatchEvent(event);
    }

    function fireSlideChanged(previousSlide, currentSlide) {
      fireSlideEnter();

      // dispatch for shiny
      if (window.jQuery) {
        if (previousSlide) {
          window.jQuery(previousSlide).trigger("hidden");
        }
        if (currentSlide) {
          window.jQuery(currentSlide).trigger("shown");
        }
      }
    }

    // hookup for slidy
    if (window.w3c_slidy) {
      window.w3c_slidy.add_observer(function (slide_num) {
        // slide_num starts at position 1
        fireSlideChanged(null, w3c_slidy.slides[slide_num - 1]);
      });
    }

  })();
</script>
